Verses: 1  vikkiragangalukkup Padaikkappattavaigalaikkuriththa Vishayaththil, Nammellaarukkum Arivu Undendru Namakkuth Theriyume. Arivu Irumaappai Undaakkum, Anbo Bakthiviruththiyai Undaakkum.
2  oruvan Thaan Edhenum Ondrai Arindhavanendru Ennikkolvaanaanaal, Ondraiyum Ariyavendiyapiragaaramaaga Avan Innum Ariyavillai.
4  vikkiragangalukkup Padaikkappattavaigalaip Pusikkira Vishayaththaippatri, Ulagaththile Vikkiragamaanadhu Ondrumillaiyendrum Oruvareyandri Veroru Dhevan Illaiyendrum Arindhirukkirom.
5  vaanaththileyum Boomiyileyum Devargal Ennappadugiravargal Undu; Ippadi Anega Devargalum Anega Karththaakalum Undaayirundhaalum,

6  pidhaavaagiya Ore Dhevan Namakkundu, Avaraale Sagalamum Undaayirukkiradhu; Avarukkendru Naamum Undaayirukkirom. Yesukiristhu Ennum Ore Karththarumnamakkundu; Avarmoolamaaich Sagalamum Undaayirukkiradhu, Avar Moolamaai Naamum Undaayirukkirom.

7  aagilum, Indha Arivu Ellaaridaththilum Illai. Silar Indraiy Varaikkum Vikkiragaththai Oru Porulendru Enni Vikkiragaththukkup Padaikkappattadhaip Pusikkiraargal; Avargaludaiya Manasaatchi Balaveenamaayiruppadhaal Asusippadugiradhu.
8  pojanamaanadhu Nammai Dhevanukku Ugandhavargalaakkamaattaadhu; Ennaththinaalenil, Pusippadhinaal Namakku Oru Menmaiyumillai, Pusiyaadhiruppadhinaal Namakku Oru Kuraivumillai.
9  aagilum Idhaikkuriththu Ungalukkundaayirukkira Adhigaaram Evvidhaththilum Balaveenarukkuth Thadukkalaagaadhapadikkup Paarungal.

10  eppadiyenil, Arivullavanaagiya Unnai Vikkiragakkovilile Pandhiyirukka Oruvan Kandaal, Balaveenanaayirukkira Avanudaiya Manasaatchi Vikkiragangalukkup Padaikkappattavaigalaip Pusippadharkuth Thunivukollumallavaa?
11  balaveenamulla Sagodharan Un Arivinimiththam Kettuppogalaamaa? Avanukkaagak Kiristhu Mariththaare.
12  ippadi Sagodhararukku Virodhamaaip Paavanjeydhu, Balaveenamulla Avargaludaiya Manasaatchiyaip Punpaduththugiradhinaale, Neengal Kiristhuvukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheygireergal.
13  aadhalaal Pojanam En Sagodharanukku Idaralundaakkinaal, Naan En Sagodharanukku Idaralundaakkaadhapadikku, Endraikkum Maamsam Pusiyaadhiruppen.
